kpi.name: RNC_294c
kpi.formula: (intersho.is_hho_w_cmod_ul_dch_q_rt + intersho.is_hho_w_cmod_ue_tx_pwr_rt + intersho.is_hho_w_cmod_dl_dpch_rt + intersho.is_hho_w_cmod_cpich_rscp_rt + intersho.is_hho_w_cmod_cpich_ecno_rt + intersho.is_hho_wo_cmod_ul_dch_q_rt + intersho.is_hho_wo_cmod_ue_tx_pwr_rt + intersho.is_hho_wo_cmod_dl_dpch_rt + intersho.is_hho_wo_cmod_rscp_rt + intersho.is_hho_wo_cmod_cpich_ecno_rt + intersho.is_hho_w_cmod_im_ims_rt + intersho.is_hho_wo_cmod_im_ims_rt + intersho.is_hho_w_cmod_emerg_call + intersho.is_hho_wo_cmod_emerg_call + intersho.is_hho_w_cm_sb_rt + intersho.is_hho_wo_cm_sb_rt + intersho.is_hho_w_cm_lb_prx_tot_rt + intersho.is_hho_w_cm_lb_ptx_tot_rt + intersho.is_hho_w_cm_lb_rsvr_sc_rt + intersho.is_hho_w_cm_lb_res_lim_rt + intersho.is_hho_wo_cm_lb_prx_tot_rt + intersho.is_hho_wo_cm_lb_ptx_tot_rt + intersho.is_hho_wo_cm_lb_rsvr_sc_rt + intersho.is_hho_wo_cm_lb_res_lim_rt)

kpi_info.title: ISHO Meas Started RT
kpi_info.use: Number of started RT ISHO measurements that result in HHO attempt is started (RANAP:RELOCATION REQUIRED sent to CN) or HC decides that no cell is good enough for handover.
kpi_info.formula:
sum(
is_hho_w_cmod_ul_dch_q_rt
+ is_hho_w_cmod_ue_tx_pwr_rt
+ is_hho_w_cmod_dl_dpch_rt
+ is_hho_w_cmod_cpich_rscp_rt
+ is_hho_w_cmod_cpich_ecno_rt
+ is_hho_wo_cmod_ul_dch_q_rt
+ is_hho_wo_cmod_ue_tx_pwr_rt
+ is_hho_wo_cmod_dl_dpch_rt
+ is_hho_wo_cmod_rscp_rt
+ is_hho_wo_cmod_cpich_ecno_rt
+ IS_HHO_W_CMOD_IM_IMS_RT
+ IS_HHO_WO_CMOD_IM_IMS_RT
+ IS_HHO_W_CMOD_EMERG_CALL
+ IS_HHO_WO_CMOD_EMERG_CALL
+ IS_HHO_W_CM_SB_RT
+ IS_HHO_WO_CM_SB_RT
+ IS_HHO_W_CM_LB_PRX_TOT_RT
+ IS_HHO_W_CM_LB_PTX_TOT_RT
+ IS_HHO_W_CM_LB_RSVR_SC_RT
+ IS_HHO_W_CM_LB_RES_LIM_RT
+ IS_HHO_WO_CM_LB_PRX_TOT_RT
+ IS_HHO_WO_CM_LB_PTX_TOT_RT
+ IS_HHO_WO_CM_LB_RSVR_SC_RT
+ IS_HHO_WO_CM_LB_RES_LIM_RT)
